headline: Albemarle (ALB) Reports US$23 Million Q2 2025 Net Income Turnaround
summary: Albemarle (ALB) recently announced a leadership update with the promotion of Ander Krupa to Executive Vice President roles, while earnings results showcased a significant turnaround from a previous net loss, reporting a net income of $22.9 million in Q2 2025. Despite sales declining year-over-year, operational improvements were evident. The company declared a dividend of $0.405 per share and was added to the Russell 2500 Value Index, possibly enhancing visibility and investor interest. This...
